About

An Enthusiastic IT Engineer with 7 years experience in multiple areas (IT Architecture, Research, System Analyst, Software Engineering, and Infrastructure) with Educational background in Electrical Engineering. Adaptable and love learning all about IT things and tools everyday. Effective team player with excellent analytical skills and the important ability to solve complex problems. Got experience researching and building framework for emerging technologies such as, internet of things, data analytics, blockchain, etc. Experienced managing some application development projects.

Support the repo by starring or forking it!
